title: Cyber Risk Assessment
shortDescription: Identify vulnerabilities and threats with comprehensive risk analysis tailored to your infrastructure.
longDescription: Our Cyber Risk Assessment service provides a holistic view of your organization's security posture. We conduct thorough evaluations of your IT infrastructure, policies, and procedures to identify potential vulnerabilities, assess threats, and prioritize risks based on business impact. Our experts deliver actionable insights and remediation roadmaps to strengthen your defenses.

title: Penetration Testing
shortDescription: Ethical hacking to expose weaknesses before attackers do. Test your defenses with real-world scenarios.
longDescription: Our Penetration Testing service simulates real-world cyberattacks to uncover exploitable vulnerabilities in your applications, networks, and systems. Using industry-standard methodologies (OWASP, PTES), our certified ethical hackers attempt to breach your defenses and provide detailed reports with proof-of-concept exploits and remediation guidance.

title: Cloud Security Audit
shortDescription: Secure your AWS, Azure, and GCP environments with expert cloud-native security audits.
longDescription: As organizations migrate to the cloud, security configurations become complex and error-prone. Our Cloud Security Audit service evaluates your cloud infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform. We assess IAM policies, encryption, network segmentation, logging, and compliance with cloud security best practices (CIS Benchmarks, AWS Well-Architected Framework).

title: Compliance & Governance
shortDescription: Navigate regulatory landscapes with confidence. Achieve and maintain SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and more.
longDescription: Regulatory compliance is non-negotiable in today's business environment. Our Compliance & Governance service helps you achieve and maintain certifications such as SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, and GDPR. We provide gap analysis, policy development, control implementation, and ongoing compliance management to ensure you meet industry standards.

title: Incident Response & Recovery
shortDescription: 24/7 rapid response to security breaches. Minimize damage, contain threats, and restore operations.
longDescription: When a security incident occurs, every second counts. Our Incident Response & Recovery service provides 24/7 emergency support to contain breaches, eradicate threats, and recover operations. Our certified incident responders follow NIST and SANS frameworks to conduct forensic analysis, preserve evidence, and guide you through communication and legal obligations.
